name: Infected (LostSourceStudios)
description:
Infected is a game about shooting zombies in a fast paced environment.
There are two types of zombies:

Classic Zombie

  • Randomly spawns
  • Deals damage when collided with player
  • AI programmed to follow player

Jumping Zombie


  • Continuously jumps
  • Deals damage when collided with player
  • AI programmed to follow player
Weapons

Pistol

  • Unlimited ammo


Shotgun

  • shoots three bullets
  • A clip of 50 bullets


Machine Gun

  • rapid fire
  • 100 in clip
